final_suggestion.agent developer: 1. Add more inline comments to clarify the purpose of specific code sections, especially where complex visualizations or calculations occur. 2. Consider using color palettes that are color-blind friendly to ensure accessibility in visualizations. 3. Implement a sample size reduction for the pair plots to improve performance and avoid potential memory issues with larger datasets.
final_suggestion.agent planner: 1. Ensure the plan includes specific timelines for each step to keep the project on schedule. 2. Consider integrating potential pitfalls or challenges for each step to better prepare the development team. 3. Improve the clarity of the plan by using bullet points or numbered lists for better readability.
